name: Growed
description:
Built for the Buddy Up Game Jam Winter 2022.

This is a simple platformer game. Eat food to grow from a small tadpole to a full grown kaiju so you can take revenge on the alligators who took your parent away from you.

This game is a collaboration between several creators:

@LittleBigHamm - Code/Design

@Lena-taylor - Code/Design

@OrbitalTenor - Art/Audio/Quality Assurance

@Anestoran - Art

@Georgethlyver - UX/UI Design

@Katoki - Art/UI
